thread.section_title: Hotel George - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great experience, friendly staff
thread.title_full: Great experience, friendly staff - Review of Hotel George - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Rebecca Z
title: Great experience, friendly staff
text: I stayed with my son for 3 days. Location was great, the breakfast was great and so was their mini bar. Their staff were exceptional. I forgot to get the name of the front desk gentleman but he was friendly, recommended us about places to visit and scheduled our transportation to the airport. Rooms was clean and comfortable. The lounge are was inviting and modern. Location was about two blocks from the train station and many restaurants in the area. I would definitely stay there again.
